conbody.p: During video playback and additional window will open, displaying the video ( ).
Right click on the Video playback window and select a value from the pop-up menu ( ) to resize the video. The window will be automatically resized to fit the video.
Double click on the video playback window to reset video size back to 100%. A second double click will restore the size of the video to the value set via the pop-up menu.
